The sum of two angles of a triangle is $\frac{6}{5}$ of a right angle, and one of these two angles is $30 ^\circ$ larger than the other. What is the degree measure of the largest angle in the triangle?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  69 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\  72 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 90  \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 102  \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 108  $
